item.description:
Get the feeling, get the feeling, get the feeling!!!

This is the first time I have ever done this!  

For those of you practicing the Law of Attraction for a while I have a special class just for you.

At 4am this morning I had a "download" I was told to get a pen and start writing. I did and I am very happy to share it. This process will be taking you to the "feeling" of abundance like you have never experienced.

This class is not for a beginner, this is for those persons practicing for a while and understand the importance and the depth of vibration. We will travel the vibrational scale but in an experintial way.

All particpants must be experienced at sitting quietly for mediation, not necessarily at a long amount of time, have practiced some form of Law of Attaction for at least 6 months to a year, be comfortably versed in the concept of manipulatoing energy and be open to a new deep meaningful experience.

All newer students, I appologize but in order to raise the conscienousness of the more experienced students I have to seperate the class for this particular program.

The class will start promptly at 7:00. The class will end at 8:00. Anyone wanting to stay and talk after is welcome to until 9:00. If you want to share a snack or beverage after it is welcomed and appreciate.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Get the Feeling, Get the Feeling, Get the Feeling!!
